description: This action requests information about the specified hypervisor to which the gateway will connect. A hypervisor is hardware, software, or firmware that creates and manages virtual machines, and allocates resources to them.

parameters.name: HypervisorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hypervisor.

nested_items.name: Host
nested_items.description: The server host of the hypervisor. This can be either an IP address or a fully-qualified domain name (FQDN).

nested_items.name: HypervisorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hypervisor.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS used to encrypt the hypervisor.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulMetadataSyncTime
nested_items.description: This is the time when the most recent successful sync of metadata occurred.

nested_items.name: LatestMetadataSyncStatus
nested_items.description: This is the most recent status for the indicated metadata sync.

nested_items.name: LatestMetadataSyncStatusMessage
nested_items.description: This is the most recent status for the indicated metadata sync.

nested_items.name: LogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group of gateways within the requested log.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: This is the name of the specified hypervisor.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: This is the current state of the specified hypervisor.
